title: Jack Sadler
text:
Jack Sadler is a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a and for the <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Super%20League">Betfred Super League</a>.
In 2021 he made his <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> début for <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford</a> against the <a href="Salford%20Red%20Devils">Salford Red Devils</a>.
